RE:  Copyright and Trademark Infringement

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

I would like to report violations of your company's Terms of Service
relating to trademark and copyright infringement.  In accordance with your
guidelines regarding these issues, and in compliance with relevant federal
copyright law, I submit the following:

 

I hereby certify, under penalty of perjury, that the following information
is accurate to the best of my knowledge and belief.

 

I am an employee in the legal department of FUNimation Entertainment.  I am
authorized to act on behalf of FUNimation Entertainment with respect to the
matters discussed herein.

 

FUNimation is a company engaged in the production of animated motion
pictures.  We own or control various exclusive copyrights and trademarks
related to the animated motion pictures known as "Bakuretsu Tenshi" a.k.a.
"Burst Angel," "Kiddy Grade," "Samurai 7," "Case Closed" a.k.a. "Detective
Conan," "Fruits Basket" and "Full Metal Alchemist" (hereafter referred to
collectively as the "Properties").  FUNimation holds exclusive rights to the
Properties throughout the United States and other territories.
Specifically, FUNimation is the exclusive licensee for production and
distribution of home videos, DVDs, video CDs, and other home video formats
and devices (hereafter referred to collectively as "Videograms") within the
referenced territories.

 

Our investigations reveal that a site for which your company provides
services is currently being used to sell and distribute unlicensed
Videograms containing episodes, movies, or other embodiments of the
Properties.  The use of the Properties in this manner is NOT authorized by
FUNimation Entertainment and is a violation of FUNimation's intellectual
property rights.  The specific site found to be in violation is NJAnime.com.
Infringing materials can be found at the following links:

 

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/fruits_basket.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/full_metal_alchemist_01.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/full_metal_alchemist_02.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/detective_conan_01.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/detective_conan_02.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/detective_conan_03.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/detective_conan_04.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/detective_conan_05.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/detective_conan_06.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/Samurai7.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/kiddygrade.htm

http://www.njanime.com/titles/ebay/bakuretsu_tenshi_01.htm

 

You will find the listed web site sells, distributes, promotes, and/or
advertises unauthorized and/or pirated videos and/or dvds containing
copyrighted material from the Properties.  Such unauthorized reproduction of
copyrighted material, coupled with the offer of such reproductions for sale
and profit, is a violation of federal law, and carries stiff penalties.  For
the foregoing reasons, FUNimation Entertainment hereby requests that you
expeditiously cause all such infringing material to be removed or the access
thereto disabled.  We further request that the names, email addresses,
physical addresses, and any other contact information regarding the parties
responsible be forwarded to us for the purpose of pursuing further legal
action against them.

 

If you should require any further information please do not hesitate to
contact me by email at Legal2@funimation.com <mailto:Legal2l@funimation.com>
.  The physical and mailing address of FUNimation Entertainment is 6851 NE
Loop 820, Fort Worth, TX, 76180.  Please contact me immediately if this
notification is not in substantial compliance with the DMCA, or if some
other problem arises with respect to our request.  I would also request
notification when the above-mentioned site is disabled. 

 

Sincerely,
